action.text: SA 2230 fell when the motion to refer the House message to accompany S. 140 with instructions to report back forthwith with the following amendment (SA 2229) tabled.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 2230 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 2229 (the instructions of the motion to refer). (consideration: CR S2112; text: CR S2112) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2230 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 2229 (the instructions of the motion to refer).
